Interface UndoableChangeListener

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface UndoableChangeListener
    The interface for detecting that the state, in which edits can or cannot be undone and/or redone, has changed

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void undoableStateChanged(UndoableChangeEvent e)
      Called when the state, in which edits can or cannot be undone or redone, has changed

    • Method Detail

      • undoableStateChanged

        void undoableStateChanged(UndoableChangeEvent e)
        Called when the state, in which edits can or cannot be undone or redone, has changed
        Parameters:
        e - an UndoableChangeEvent object
